TextView.android:text: Thank you for choosing Speech Essentials! This app is a complete speech therapy practice tool for articulation\n\nSpeech Essentials was created by an ASHA certified Speech-Language Pathologist for parents and therapists to supplement therapy for speech delays and disorders in children and adults. This speech app provides a fun and engaging environment while helping to improve speech skills. Determine what sound(s) you need to work on and you are ready to start!

Once you know what sound(s) you need to work on it is important to practice saying the sound clearly all on its own (in isolation). To get more information on how to produce a sound and to see a video tutorial, tap on the sound, then tap on the ‘Tips’ icon at the bottom left of the box.\n\nAfter the sound is easily said in isolation, add a vowel sound before and/or after the consonant sound to make a syllable. For example, if the target sound is b say “bye, bee, bay, boo, abe, eeb, ub” etc. These syllables may sound funny but will ultimately help ease the transition to the word level.

There are many fun options when working at the word level. Tap the sound button then choose ‘flashcards’ or one of the game options such as ‘matching’ or ‘word find’. Once you have chosen your activity you can choose what sound position(s) you want to practice (beginning, middle, or end) and then tap ‘start’.

Two games are automatically included with each sound: ‘Matching’ and ‘Word Find’. These and other games (available for purchase) are a novel and fun way to practice articulation sounds. Games target sounds at the word level and include a picture of the words. Scoring, mirror, and word position features are included.

In all activities there is the option for a ‘mirror’ to be used! Tap the ‘mirror’ icon on the right of the screen and use the video function on your device to see the child’s mouth as they practice target sounds. Visual feedback is particularly helpful for sounds that involve the lips and tip of the tongue such as: th, l, s, f, v, etc.

While in an activity or game there is the option to keep track of correct and incorrect productions of the target sound. Tap the green ‘star’ button for each correct production or the red ‘no’ button for an incorrect or distorted sound. At the end of the activity you will have the option to create/choose a profile and save the scores for that activity. On the app home page you can then tap on the ‘scores’ button on the bottom left to see all saved data.\n\nWith practice, patience, and persistence we know you can help those you work with achieve their speech and communication goals. We wish you the best as you embark on this journey together!
Created by Valley Speech & Language Therapy
